{{ $tag := .tag }} {{ .attributes }} {{ $defaults := .defaults }}
{{ range .attributes }} {{ $attr := .name }} {{ range .values }} {{ $val := delimit (slice $attr "=" `"` . `"`) "" }} {{ delimit (slice "<" $tag " " $val ">" ) "" }} {{ replace (replace (delimit $defaults "") "{{ $attr }}" $attr) "{{ . }}" . | safeHTML }} {{ delimit (slice "") "" }} {{ end }} {{ end }}
